detail_desc: Jumper in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with a slightly wider, rib-trimmed neckline and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, patch front pockets, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.

Shirt in soft Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Fastening with one button at the front, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Jersey blouse with a gently draped wrapover front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a wide hem.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and legs and press-stud fasteners.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Knee-length dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a square neckline, elastication at the top and a smocked bodice. Short, elasticated raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and slim legs with creases.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with notch lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut shirt dress in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pockets with a pleat. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short shorts in soft viscose twill with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, a zip fly and button, pleats at the front and pockets in the side seams.

Shirt in premium cotton Oxford with a button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Double-breasted dress in woven fabric with notch lapels, a V-neck, wrapover front, long sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline and press-studs at the crotch.

Popover jacket in an airy weave with a drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and a zip at the top. Seam with a loose edge at the front, a kangaroo pocket, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a decorative opening at the top, a concealed zip at the back and long, wide sleeves with cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Cargo jacket in washed cotton twill with a motif. Collar, buttons down the front, front pockets and flap chest pockets. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back with a safety button at the top. Seam at the waist and a slightly stretchy skirt with a slit at the back. Lined.
Metal studs in various designs. Size from 0.5 to 1.5 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Longer V-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers with lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Lined bandeau bikini top with side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, double shoulder straps, and a drawstring front and back. No fasteners.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with extra-long sleeves.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a zip fly and press stud, diagonal pockets with hook and loop fastening at the front and one flap back pocket. Snow flaps at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
High-waisted shorts with a pleat front and tie belt in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Zip fly with a concealed button, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded parka in a nylon weave with a lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front and a sleeve pocket and side pockets with a flap and concealed hook and loop fastening. Gathered seams at the sides and down the back and sleeves. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the front. Lined.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Thin metal chain necklace with interchangeable pendants in different designs. Adjustable length, 40-46 cm.
Comfort blankets in an airy cotton weave, one with an all-over print. Size 60x60 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bell-shaped skirt in an airy viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes and a small satin bow at the front.
Wide blouse in woven fabric with inset lace trims, a small, frilled collar and gathered yoke front and back. Buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with a button and frill at the cuffs.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit over the hips and thighs and skinny fit over the calves. Regular waist, button fly and slightly shorter legs.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband. Sleeveless top in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, frill at the shoulders and yoke with an embroidered trim. Leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Hairband with a bow at the front and elastic at the back.
Short, fitted dress in glittery jersey. Straight cut at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a slit at the front.
Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with raw edges. Size 60x200 cm.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft wool knit containing some recycled cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with three wrapover bodysuits, two pairs of leggings, a romper suit, hat and scratch mittens in soft organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved bodysuits with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist. Romper with short sleeves and legs, and press-studs at the side. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem, and scratch mittens with ribbed cuffs.

Short dress in textured satin with a unique nursing feature, V-neck and short flounced sleeves. Top layered over the dress with elastication, a frill trim and decorative lacing at the hem. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Patterned jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.

Boiler suit in cotton denim with a soft brushed finish. Collar, a concealed zip down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves, a tapered waist with a sewn-in tie belt at the front, and tapered legs with flap leg pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, concealed press-studs down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sandals in shimmering imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the ankles and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in organic cotton jersey with lace details and lightly padded opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully-fashioned fabric trainers with an imitation leather heel cap, lightly padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Lace top with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back and in one side, cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and flounced hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Fully lined swimsuit with appliqués at the top and one wide and one narrow shoulder strap.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Fully lined, textured swimsuit with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed elastication under the bust and a low-cut back.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top with a round neckline.
Padded gilet with a detachable faux-fur trimmed hood, stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Hat and scarf set in a soft rib knit. Hat with a turned-up hem. Size of scarf 25x175 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hair grips decorated with plastic beads. Length 9 cm.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué on the front.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Necklaces in metal chains of different designs. Adjustable length 43-51 cm, 50-58 cm and 58-66 cm.

Shirt jacket in a sturdy, checked weave with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, press-studs down the front, a yoke at the back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and side pockets. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Tight fit. The tops are made partly from recycled polyester.
Long jumper in a soft knit in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
